name: 1x1 (WIP)
description:
1x1 is a one button puzzle game made for the 1 button game jam!

Game instructions can be found under "How To Play"

Thank you for checking out my game! This was a really fun, albeit stressful, experience. It felt really good being able to "complete" a project, even though there's still a ton of work that needs to be done. I'm very happy with what I was able to complete within the given timeframe and I do plan on completing this project. So if you found the game interesting and want updates on it's release, feel free to follow me at @thebmanishere.

Feel free to leave any comments, questions or feedback!
